stage.name: stage
stage.description:
Stage of the build you want to inspect.
    archive - builds the project archive that would be uploaded to EAS when building
    pre-build - prepares the project to be built with Gradle/Xcode. Does not run the native build.
    post-build - builds the native project and leaves the output directory for inspection

rollout-percentage.name: rollout-percentage
rollout-percentage.description: Percentage of users this update should be immediately available to. Users not in the rollout will be served the previous latest update on the branch, even if that update is itself being rolled out. The specified number must be an integer between 1 and 100. When not specified, this defaults to 100.
